column4: First two weeks of February according to Wikipedia

Starts in July according to Wikipedia; generally runs for two weeks (https://www.toronto.ca/news/summerlicious-torontos-favourite-foodie-experience-starts-today-at-more-than-200-restaurants-across-the-city/)

Generally starts on the last Friday in November and ends on the last Sunday in March (https://www.toronto.ca/news/city-of-toronto-welcomes-the-winter-season-by-opening-41-outdoor-ice-rinks/ and https://www.toronto.ca/explore-enjoy/festivals-events/welcome-to-winter/)
These are estimates based on general trend as dates for 2025 are TBD. https://www.musicfestivalwizard.com/festivals/canadian-music-week-2025/
Usually starts either on 12th or 13th April (https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Vaisakhi#Sikhism)
Usually the weekend following Victoria Day (https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Anime_North)
